settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: You can track your order by entering your order number and email address in the fields above. Once submitted, you'll see the latest status and tracking information.

settings.question: Where can I find my order number?
settings.answer: Your order number is found in the order confirmation email we sent immediately after you placed your order. It usually begins with “ # ”.

settings.question: I entered my information, but nothing is showing. What should I do?
settings.answer: Confirm a few things: Double-check that you’ve typed your order number and email address just as they are displayed in your confirmation email. Should the problem continue, please email our friendly customer service at support@stienhardt.com.

settings.question: My tracking shows "Delivered," but I haven't received my order.
settings.answer:
If you see “Delivered” as your tracking status, the package isn’t with you, start here.

  • Poll your family members or people you’re close to in your neighborhood.
  • Think about your delivery location (porch, mailbox, etc.
  • The only way to know for sure is to contact the actual shipping carrier. 

If after attempting to track down your package you’re still not having any luck, get in touch and we’ll work with you to locate it.

settings.question: How long does it take for my order to ship?
settings.answer: Most orders are processed within 1–3 business days. Custom or made-to-order pieces may take longer. Estimated delivery times are provided at checkout and in your confirmation email.

settings.question: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
settings.answer: If your order has not yet shipped, you can still modify or void the transaction. If your plans change, please reach out to Customer Care at 917-909-6402 if you would like assistance rebooking your travel.

settings.question: Can I make changes to my order after it’s placed?
settings.answer: As long as your order hasn’t shipped yet, we’re often able to make your adjustments. If you have further questions, please contact us as soon as possible at support@stienhardt.com.

settings.question: What should I do if my order is delayed or lost?
settings.answer: If your order is running late after the estimated delivery date or appears to be lost, please contact our Customer Care team. It doesn’t matter what the issue is, we’re going to make sure it’s addressed immediately.

settings.question: Can I return or exchange my order?
settings.answer: Heck to the yah! We aim to make all our customers completely satisfied. We have a 15-day hassle-free return policy. To find out more information, or to initiate a return, visit our Returns page or contact Customer Care.

settings.question: What if I entered the wrong shipping address?
settings.answer: If you notice an error in your shipping address after placing your order, you need to contact us immediately. You might be surprised to hear, as long as it hasn’t shipped, we can usually correct an address even on an order!

settings.all-sold-out-text: Please choose and update the products as per availability!
settings.guest-customer-message: Please login to save your wishlist
